name: owfn-site
description: A global network united by the vision to build a better world through technology and humanity.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 "public/**/*" dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --loader:.ts=tsx --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"'

author: OWFN
